name: testent-vscode-extension
description: Testent automates unit test writing for Typescript

testent.general.sourceFolder.markdownDescription: Specifies folder where source files are with relation to project root folder. If source is at root folder set empty string as value like ""

enumDescriptions: Logs all errors, warnings, and messages
Logs all errors, warnings, and messages with extra context useful for debugging
testent.logging.outputLevel.markdownDescription: Specifies how much (if any) output will be sent to the GitLens output channel

testent.codeLens.enabled.markdownDescription: Specifies whether to provide any code lens.

testent.terminalOptions.windowsTerminalT.markdownDescription: Specify the Windows terminal to use
enumDescriptions: Your system uses Windows PowerShell to run commands
Your system uses Bash kind terminal to run commands
Your system uses Windows CMD to run commands

testent.terminalOptions.windowsTerminalE.markdownDescription: Specify absolutepath to the terminal executable

testent.terminalOptions.linuxTerminalTyp.markdownDescription: Specify terminal to use in Linux
enumDescriptions: Your system uses Bash to run commands
Your system uses Bourne (sh) to run commands

testent.terminalOptions.linuxTerminalExe.markdownDescription: Specify absolutepath to the terminal executable or empty string if your default shell is supported

testent.terminalOptions.macTerminalType.markdownDescription: Specify terminal to use in Mac
enumDescriptions: Your system uses zsh to run commands
Your system uses Bash to run commands

testent.terminalOptions.macTerminalExecu.markdownDescription: Specify absolutepath to the terminal executable or empty string if your default shell is supported

testent.javascriptRunOptions.commonPreEx.markdownDescription: Specifies things to add to the terminal execution command before the 'testent.runOptions.executable'

testent.javascriptRunOptions.envVarsWhen.markdownDescription: Specifies environmental variables for when running ES module. Available variables are 'sourceFileDirAbsPath', 'tsConfigJsonFileAbsPath', 'tsNodeInstallationPath'. Surround vars with '{{' and '}}'
Specifies environmental variables for when running CommonJS module. Available variables are 'sourceFileDirAbsPath' and 'tsConfigJsonFileAbsPath'. Surround vars with '{{' and '}}'

testent.javascriptRunOptions.socketPort.markdownDescription: Specifies port for socket communication between extension and user's instrumented code running in an child process.

testent.typescriptRunOptions.commonPreEx.markdownDescription: Specifies things to add to the terminal execution command before the 'testent.runOptions.executable'

testent.typescriptRunOptions.envVarsWhen.markdownDescription: Specifies environmental variables for when running ES module. Available variables are 'sourceFileDirAbsPath', 'tsConfigJsonFileAbsPath', 'tsNodeInstallationPath'. Surround vars with '{{' and '}}'
Specifies environmental variables for when running CommonJS module. Available variables are 'sourceFileDirAbsPath' and 'tsConfigJsonFileAbsPath'. Surround vars with '{{' and '}}'

testent.typescriptRunOptions.tsconfigRel.markdownDescription: Specify relative path to tsconfig-file in relation to project's root path and the name of the file

testent.typescriptRunOptions.socketPort.markdownDescription: Specifies port for socket communication between extension and user's instrumented code running in an child process.

testent.telemetry.enabled.markdownDescription: Specifies whether to send telemetry data or not

scripts.test-dev: pnpm bundle-dependencies-dev && pnpm bundle-extension-dev && pnpm pretest-webpack && node ./out/test/runTest.js
scripts.bundle-dependencies-dev: rush bundle-stripped-down-ts-node & rush recorder-bundle-dev & rush record-globalvar-saver-bundle-dev & wait
scripts.bundle-dependencies-prod: rush bundle-stripped-down-ts-node & rush recorder-bundle-prod & rush record-globalvar-saver-bundle-prod & wait
scripts.package-extension-dev: pnpm clean && pnpm bundle-dependencies-dev && pnpm bundle-extension-dev && vsce package --no-dependencies --out publish/
scripts.package-extension-prod: pnpm clean && pnpm bundle-dependencies-prod && pnpm bundle-extension-prod && vsce package --no-dependencies --out publish/
